blocks.name: df-eqvrels
blocks.content: Define the class of equivalence relations. For sets, being an element of the class of equivalence relations is equivalent to satisfying the equivalence relation predicate, see ~ eleqvrelsrel . Alternate definitions are ~ dfeqvrels2 and ~ dfeqvrels3 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 7-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: df-eqvrel
blocks.content: Define the equivalence relation predicate. (Read: ` R ` is an equivalence relation.) For sets, being an element of the class of equivalence relations ( ~ df-eqvrels ) is equivalent to satisfying the equivalence relation predicate, see ~ eleqvrelsrel . Alternate definitions are ~ dfeqvrel2 and ~ dfeqvrel3 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 17-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: df-coeleqvrels
blocks.content: Define the the coelement equivalence relations class, the class of sets with coelement equivalence relations. For sets, being an element of the class of coelement equivalence relations is equivalent to satisfying the coelement equivalence relation predicate, see ~ elcoeleqvrelsrel . Alternate definition is ~ dfcoeleqvrels . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 28-Nov-2022.)

blocks.name: df-coeleqvrel
blocks.content: Define the coelement equivalence relation predicate. (Read: the coelement equivalence relation on ` A ` .) Alternate definition is ~ dfcoeleqvrel . For sets, being an element of the class of coelement equivalence relations is equivalent to satisfying the coelement equivalence relation predicate, see ~ elcoeleqvrelsrel . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 11-Dec-2021.)

thm dfeqvrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ceqvrels, crab(s0, crels, w3a(wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  rabbieq(s0, ceqvrels, crels, w3a(wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3))))))), w3a(wss(cres(cid, cdm(cv(s0))), cv(s0)), wss(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0))))
  dfeqvrels2(s0)
  3anbi123i(wss(cres(cid, cdm(cv(s0))), cv(s0)), wss(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3)))))))
  idrefALT(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), cv(s0))
  cnvsym(s1, s2, cv(s0))
  cotr(s1, s2, s3, cv(s0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
}

thm dfeqvrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ EqvRels = { s0 ∈ Rels |(∀(s1 ∈ dom(s0), s1[s0]s1)∧ ∀(s1, ∀(s2,(s1[s0]s2 → s2[s0]s1)))∧ ∀(s1, ∀(s2, ∀(s3,((s1[s0]s2 ∧ s2[s0]s3)→ s1[s0]s3)))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
} = {
  rabbieq(s0, ceqvrels, crels, (∀(s1 ∈ dom(s0), s1[s0]s1)∧ ∀(s1, ∀(s2,(s1[s0]s2 → s2[s0]s1)))∧ ∀(s1, ∀(s2, ∀(s3,((s1[s0]s2 ∧ s2[s0]s3)→ s1[s0]s3))))), ((= |` dom(s0))⊆ s0 ∧ `' s0 ⊆ s0 ∧(s0 ∘ s0)⊆ s0))
  dfeqvrels2(s0)
  3anbi123i((= |` dom(s0))⊆ s0, `' s0 ⊆ s0, (s0 ∘ s0)⊆ s0, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(s0), s1[s0]s1), ∀(s1, ∀(s2,(s1[s0]s2 → s2[s0]s1))), ∀(s1, ∀(s2, ∀(s3,((s1[s0]s2 ∧ s2[s0]s3)→ s1[s0]s3)))))
  idrefALT(s1, dom(s0), s0)
  cnvsym(s1, s2, s0)
  cotr(s1, s2, s3, s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
}

  sseq12d(cres(cid, cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), cres(cid, cdm(c0)), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  reseq2d(cid, cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)

  cnveq(cv(hs0), c0)
  sseq12d(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

thm eleqvrels2(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ EqvRels ↔(((= |` dom(c0))⊆ c0 ∧ `' c0 ⊆ c0 ∧(c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0)∧ c0 ∈ Rels))
} = {
  rabeqel(hs0, c0, ceqvrels, crels, ((= |` dom(c0))⊆ c0 ∧ `' c0 ⊆ c0 ∧(c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0), ((= |` dom(hs0))⊆ hs0 ∧ `' hs0 ⊆ hs0 ∧(hs0 ∘ hs0)⊆ hs0))
  dfeqvrels2(hs0)
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c0, (= |` dom(hs0))⊆ hs0, `' hs0 ⊆ hs0, (hs0 ∘ hs0)⊆ hs0, (= |` dom(c0))⊆ c0, `' c0 ⊆ c0, (c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0)
  sseq12d((= |` dom(hs0)), hs0, (= |` dom(c0)), c0, hs0 = c0)
  reseq2d(cid, dom(hs0), dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  sseq12d(`' hs0, hs0, `' c0, c0, hs0 = c0)
  cnveq(hs0, c0)
  sseq12d((hs0 ∘ hs0), hs0, (c0 ∘ c0), c0, hs0 = c0)
  coideq(hs0, c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crels)
  diff.hs0.w(((= |` dom(c0))⊆ c0 ∧ `' c0 ⊆ c0 ∧(c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0))
}

thm eleqvrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ceqvrels), wa(w3a(wral(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))), wcel(c0, crels)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  rabeqel(hs0, c0, ceqvrels, crels, w3a(wral(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))), w3a(wral(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))))
  dfeqvrels3(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))), wral(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  breq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s0))
  2albidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  breq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))
  2albidv(s1, s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))
  breq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  breq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  breq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crels)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wral(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))))

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm eleqvrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ EqvRels ↔((∀(s0 ∈ dom(c0), s0[c0]s0)∧ ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(s0[c0]s1 → s1[c0]s0)))∧ ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2)))))∧ c0 ∈ Rels))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  rabeqel(hs0, c0, ceqvrels, crels, (∀(s0 ∈ dom(c0), s0[c0]s0)∧ ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(s0[c0]s1 → s1[c0]s0)))∧ ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2))))), (∀(s0 ∈ dom(hs0), s0[hs0]s0)∧ ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(s0[hs0]s1 → s1[hs0]s0)))∧ ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0[hs0]s1 ∧ s1[hs0]s2)→ s0[hs0]s2))))))
  dfeqvrels3(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c0, ∀(s0 ∈ dom(hs0), s0[hs0]s0), ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(s0[hs0]s1 → s1[hs0]s0))), ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0[hs0]s1 ∧ s1[hs0]s2)→ s0[hs0]s2)))), ∀(s0 ∈ dom(c0), s0[c0]s0), ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(s0[c0]s1 → s1[c0]s0))), ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2)))))
  raleqbidv(s0, dom(hs0), dom(c0), hs0 = c0, s0[hs0]s0, s0[c0]s0)
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  breq(hs0, c0, s0, s0)
  2albidv(s0, s1, hs0 = c0, (s0[hs0]s1 → s1[hs0]s0), (s0[c0]s1 → s1[c0]s0))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, s0[hs0]s1, s1[hs0]s0, s0[c0]s1, s1[c0]s0)
  breq(hs0, c0, s1, s0)
  albidv(s0, hs0 = c0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0[hs0]s1 ∧ s1[hs0]s2)→ s0[hs0]s2))), ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2))))
  2albidv(s1, s2, hs0 = c0, ((s0[hs0]s1 ∧ s1[hs0]s2)→ s0[hs0]s2), ((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, (s0[hs0]s1 ∧ s1[hs0]s2), s0[hs0]s2, (s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2), s0[c0]s2)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, s0[hs0]s1, s1[hs0]s2, s0[c0]s1, s1[c0]s2)
  breq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  breq(hs0, c0, s1, s2)
  breq(hs0, c0, s0, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crels)
  diff.hs0.w((∀(s0 ∈ dom(c0), s0[c0]s0)∧ ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(s0[c0]s1 → s1[c0]s0)))∧ ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ∧ s1[c0]s2)→ s0[c0]s2))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: eqvrelsym
blocks.content: An equivalence relation is symmetric. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 2-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqvrelsym(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  3syl(w0, wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)), weqvrel(c1), wrel(c1))
  eqvrelrel(c1)
  relbrcnvg(c1, c0, c2)
  ssbrd(c0, ccnv(c1), c2, c1, w0)
  3syl(w0, wss(ccnv(c1), c1), weqvrel(c1), wsymrel(c1))
  eqvrelsymrel(c1)
  simplbi(wsymrel(c1), wss(ccnv(c1), c1), wrel(c1))
  dfsymrel2(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqvrelsym(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[c1]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → EqvRel(c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[c1]c0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0[`' c1]c2)
  mpbird(w0, c0[`' c1]c2, c2[c1]c0)
  3syl(w0, (c0[`' c1]c2 ↔ c2[c1]c0), EqvRel(c1), Rel(c1))
  eqvrelrel(c1)
  relbrcnvg(c1, c0, c2)
  ssbrd(c0, `' c1, c2, c1, w0)
  3syl(w0, `' c1 ⊆ c1, EqvRel(c1), SymRel(c1))
  eqvrelsymrel(c1)
  simplbi(SymRel(c1), `' c1 ⊆ c1, Rel(c1))
  dfsymrel2(c1)
}

blocks.origin:
thm eqvreltr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
} = {
  syld(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3))
  ex(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, c3))))
  elabd(hs0, c2, wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))), wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, c3)), wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)))
  syl2an(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wrel(c1), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  brrelex1(c1, c2, c3)
  simpr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, c3), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, c1)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c2, c1, c3)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, c3)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl2an(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wcel(c0, universe), wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  simpl(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  brrelex1(c1, c0, c2)
  syl2an(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wcel(c3, universe), wrel(c1), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  syl(w0, wrel(c1), weqvrel(c1))
  eqvrelrel(c1)
  simpr(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  brrelex2(c1, c2, c3)
  brcog(hs0, c0, universe, c3, universe, c1, c1)
  ssbrd(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1), weqvrel(c1))
  simp3d(weqvrel(c1), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1), wss(cres(cid, cdm(c1)), c1), wss(ccnv(c1), c1))
  simplbi(weqvrel(c1), w3a(wss(cres(cid, cdm(c1)), c1), wss(ccnv(c1), c1), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1)), wrel(c1))
  dfeqvrel2(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqvreltr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → EqvRel(c1))
} = {
  syld(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3, c0[(c1 ∘ c1)]c3)
  ex(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3), c0[(c1 ∘ c1)]c3)
  mpbird((w0 ∧(c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)), c0[(c1 ∘ c1)]c3, ∃(hs0,(c0[c1]hs0 ∧ hs0[c1]c3)))
  elabd(hs0, c2, (w0 ∧(c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)), (c0[c1]hs0 ∧ hs0[c1]c3), (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3))
  syl2an(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3), c2 ∈ 𝕌, Rel(c1), c2[c1]c3)
  brrelex1(c1, c2, c3)
  simpr(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, c0[c1]hs0, hs0[c1]c3, c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3)
  breq2(hs0, c2, c0, c1)
  breq1(hs0, c2, c1, c3)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧(c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)), (c0[(c1 ∘ c1)]c3 ↔ ∃(hs0,(c0[c1]hs0 ∧ hs0[c1]c3))), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl2an(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3), c0 ∈ 𝕌, Rel(c1), c0[c1]c2)
  simpl(c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3)
  brrelex1(c1, c0, c2)
  syl2an(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3), c3 ∈ 𝕌, Rel(c1), c2[c1]c3)
  syl(w0, Rel(c1), EqvRel(c1))
  eqvrelrel(c1)
  simpr(c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3)
  brrelex2(c1, c2, c3)
  brcog(hs0, c0, universe, c3, universe, c1, c1)
  ssbrd(c0, (c1 ∘ c1), c3, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, (c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1, EqvRel(c1))
  simp3d(EqvRel(c1), (c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1, (= |` dom(c1))⊆ c1, `' c1 ⊆ c1)
  simplbi(EqvRel(c1), ((= |` dom(c1))⊆ c1 ∧ `' c1 ⊆ c1 ∧(c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1), Rel(c1))
  dfeqvrel2(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: eqvrelref
blocks.content: An equivalence relation is reflexive on its field. Compare Theorem 3M of [Enderton] p. 56. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 2-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqvrelref(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  mpbid(w0, wex(hs0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wex(hs0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))), weqvrel(c1), wrel(c1))
  eqvrelrel(c1)
  releldmb(hs0, c1, c0)
  eqvreltr4d(c0, c1, c0, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), weqvrel(c1))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm eqvrelref(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[c1]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → EqvRel(c1))

} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, c0[c1]c0, c0[c1]hs0)

  3syl(w0, (c0 ∈ dom(c1)↔ ∃(hs0, c0[c1]hs0)), EqvRel(c1), Rel(c1))
  eqvrelrel(c1)
  releldmb(hs0, c1, c0)
  eqvreltr4d(c0, c1, c0, hs0, (w0 ∧ c0[c1]hs0))

blocks.name: eqvrelth
blocks.content: Basic property of equivalence relations. Theorem 73 of [Suppes] p. 82. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jul-2015.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 2-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqvrelth(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))
  eqrdv(hs0, cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1), wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
  3bitr4d(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)))
  impbida(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)))
  syldanl(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  biimpa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  eqvrelsymb(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  impl(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)))
  eqvreltr(c2, c1, c0, cv(hs0), w0)
  impl(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  eqvreltr(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), w0)
  sylancr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  elecg(cv(hs0), universe, c0, cdm(c1), c1)
  sylancr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c1)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  vex(hs0)
  sylan(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c2, universe), wrel(c1))
  syl(w0, wrel(c1), weqvrel(c1))
  eqvrelrel(c1)
  brrelex2(c1, c0, c2)
  elecg(cv(hs0), universe, c2, universe, c1)
  eqvrelsym(c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)), weqvrel(c1))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wbr(c2, c1, c0), wcel(c0, cec(c2, c1)))
  eleqtrd(c0, cec(c2, c1), cec(c0, c1), wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wcel(c0, cec(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, c0))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, c0))
  eqvrelref(c0, c1, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wb(wcel(c0, cec(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  elecALTV(c0, cdm(c1), c0, cdm(c1), c1)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wb(wcel(c0, cec(c2, c1)), wbr(c2, c1, c0)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  dmec2d(c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  elecALTV(c2, cdm(c1), c0, cdm(c1), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cec(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cec(c2, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
}

thm eqvrelth(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2 ↔[c0]c1 =[c2]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → EqvRel(c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(c1))
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0[c1]c2, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1)
  eqrdv(hs0, [c0]c1, [c2]c1, (w0 ∧ c0[c1]c2))
  3bitr4d((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c2), hs0 ∈[c0]c1, hs0 ∈[c2]c1, c0[c1]hs0, c2[c1]hs0)
  impbida((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c2), c0[c1]hs0, c2[c1]hs0)
  syldanl(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0[c1]hs0, c2[c1]hs0, c2[c1]c0)
  biimpa(w0, c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c0)
  eqvrelsymb(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  impl(w0, c2[c1]c0, c0[c1]hs0, c2[c1]hs0)
  eqvreltr(c2, c1, c0, hs0, w0)
  impl(w0, c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]hs0, c0[c1]hs0)
  eqvreltr(c0, c1, c2, hs0, w0)
  sylancr((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c2), (hs0 ∈[c0]c1 ↔ c0[c1]hs0), hs0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ dom(c1))
  adantr(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0 ∈ dom(c1))
  elecg(hs0, universe, c0, dom(c1), c1)
  sylancr((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c2), (hs0 ∈[c2]c1 ↔ c2[c1]hs0), hs0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  sylan(w0, c0[c1]c2, c2 ∈ 𝕌, Rel(c1))
  syl(w0, Rel(c1), EqvRel(c1))
  eqvrelrel(c1)
  brrelex2(c1, c0, c2)
  elecg(hs0, universe, c2, universe, c1)
  eqvrelsym(c0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧[c0]c1 =[c2]c1))
  adantr(w0, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1, EqvRel(c1))
  mpbid((w0 ∧[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), c2[c1]c0, c0 ∈[c2]c1)
  eleqtrd(c0, [c2]c1, [c0]c1, (w0 ∧[c0]c1 =[c2]c1))
  mpbird((w0 ∧[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), c0 ∈[c0]c1, c0[c1]c0)
  adantr(w0, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1, c0[c1]c0)
  eqvrelref(c0, c1, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), (c0 ∈[c0]c1 ↔ c0[c1]c0), c0 ∈ dom(c1), c0 ∈ dom(c1))
  elecALTV(c0, dom(c1), c0, dom(c1), c1)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), (c0 ∈[c2]c1 ↔ c2[c1]c0), c2 ∈ dom(c1), c0 ∈ dom(c1))
  mpbid((w0 ∧[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), c2 ∈ dom(c1), c0 ∈ dom(c1))
  dmec2d(c0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧[c0]c1 =[c2]c1))
  simpr(w0, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1)
  adantr(w0, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1, c0 ∈ dom(c1))
  elecALTV(c2, dom(c1), c0, dom(c1), c1)
  diff.hs0.c([c0]c1)
  diff.hs0.c([c2]c1)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c2))
}

blocks.name: eqvreldisj
blocks.content: Equivalence classes do not overlap. In other words, two equivalence classes are either equal or disjoint. Theorem 74 of [Suppes] p. 83. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 2-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqvreldisj(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(weqvrel(c0), wo(wceq(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)), wceq(cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)), emptycls)))
} = {
  orcomd(weqvrel(c0), wceq(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)), wceq(cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)), emptycls))
  orrd(weqvrel(c0), wceq(cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)), emptycls), wceq(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))
  syl5bi(weqvrel(c0), wn(wceq(cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)), emptycls)), wceq(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))))
  neq0(hs0, cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))
  exlimdv(hs0, weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0))), wceq(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))
  ex(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0))), wceq(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))
  eqvrelthi(c1, c0, c2, wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))))
  eqvreltr4d(c1, c0, c2, cv(hs0), wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))))
  simpl(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0))))
  mpbid(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))), wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c1, c0)))
  sylancl(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c1, c0)), wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  syl(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c1, c0)))
  adantl(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c1, c0)))
  elinel1(cv(hs0), cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0))
  ecexr(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  elecALTV(c1, universe, cv(hs0), universe, c0)
  mpbid(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0)))
  sylancl(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  syl(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0)))
  adantl(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0)))
  elinel2(cv(hs0), cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0))
  ecexr(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  vex(hs0)
  elecALTV(c2, universe, cv(hs0), universe, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(weqvrel(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cec(c1, c0), cec(c2, c0)))
}

thm eqvreldisj(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (EqvRel(c0)→([c1]c0 =[c2]c0 ∨([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)= ∅))
} = {
  orcomd(EqvRel(c0), [c1]c0 =[c2]c0, ([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)= ∅)
  orrd(EqvRel(c0), ([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)= ∅, [c1]c0 =[c2]c0)
  syl5bi(EqvRel(c0), ¬([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)= ∅, [c1]c0 =[c2]c0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)))
  neq0(hs0, ([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0))
  exlimdv(hs0, EqvRel(c0), hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0), [c1]c0 =[c2]c0)
  ex(EqvRel(c0), hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0), [c1]c0 =[c2]c0)
  eqvrelthi(c1, c0, c2, (EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)))
  eqvreltr4d(c1, c0, c2, hs0, (EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)))
  simpl(EqvRel(c0), hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0))
  mpbid((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)), c1[c0]hs0, hs0 ∈[c1]c0)
  sylancl((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)), (hs0 ∈[c1]c0 ↔ c1[c0]hs0), c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)), c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈[c1]c0)
  adantl(EqvRel(c0), hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0), hs0 ∈[c1]c0)
  elinel1(hs0, [c1]c0, [c2]c0)
  ecexr(hs0, c1, c0)
  elecALTV(c1, universe, hs0, universe, c0)
  mpbid((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)), c2[c0]hs0, hs0 ∈[c2]c0)
  sylancl((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)), (hs0 ∈[c2]c0 ↔ c2[c0]hs0), c2 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0)), c2 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈[c2]c0)
  adantl(EqvRel(c0), hs0 ∈([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0), hs0 ∈[c2]c0)
  elinel2(hs0, [c1]c0, [c2]c0)
  ecexr(hs0, c2, c0)
  vex(hs0)
  elecALTV(c2, universe, hs0, universe, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(([c1]c0 ⋂[c2]c0))
  diff.hs0.w(EqvRel(c0))
  diff.hs0.w([c1]c0 =[c2]c0)
}

blocks.name: qsdisjALTV
blocks.content: Elements of a quotient set do not overlap. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 12-Oct-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 3-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm qsdisjALTV(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  -| wi(w0, weqvrel(c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cqs(c3, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cqs(c3, c2)))
} = {
  mpdan(w0, wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)), wcel(c0, cqs(c3, c2)))
  ectocld(hs0, c0, cqs(c3, c2), c3, c2, w0, wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)), wo(wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), wceq(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), emptycls)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c0), wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), wceq(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), emptycls), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
  eqeq1(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c0, c1)
  eqeq1d(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), emptycls, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c0))
  ineq1(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c0, c1)
  mpidan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wo(wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), wceq(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), emptycls)), wcel(c1, cqs(c3, c2)))
  ectocld(hs1, c1, cqs(c3, c2), c3, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wo(wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), wceq(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), emptycls)), wo(wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), cec(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), cec(cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls)))
  eqid(cqs(c3, c2))
  orbi12d(wceq(cec(cv(hs1), c2), c1), wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), cec(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), cec(cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls), wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), wceq(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), emptycls))
  eqeq2(cec(cv(hs1), c2), c1, cec(cv(hs0), c2))
  eqeq1d(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), cec(cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls, cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), wceq(cec(cv(hs1), c2), c1))
  ineq2(cec(cv(hs1), c2), c1, cec(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wo(wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), cec(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), cec(cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls)), weqvrel(c2))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), weqvrel(c2))
  eqvreldisj(c2, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wo(wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), wceq(cin(cec(cv(hs0), c2), c1), emptycls)))
}

thm qsdisjALTV(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 = c1 ∨(c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅))
  ⊣ (w0 → EqvRel(c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c3 /. c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(c3 /. c2))
} = {
  mpdan(w0, (c0 = c1 ∨(c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅), c0 ∈(c3 /. c2))
  ectocld(hs0, c0, (c3 /. c2), c3, c2, w0, (c0 = c1 ∨(c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅), ([hs0]c2 = c1 ∨([hs0]c2 ⋂ c1)= ∅))
  orbi12d([hs0]c2 = c0, [hs0]c2 = c1, ([hs0]c2 ⋂ c1)= ∅, c0 = c1, (c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  eqeq1([hs0]c2, c0, c1)
  eqeq1d(([hs0]c2 ⋂ c1), emptycls, (c0 ⋂ c1), [hs0]c2 = c0)
  ineq1([hs0]c2, c0, c1)
  mpidan(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, ([hs0]c2 = c1 ∨([hs0]c2 ⋂ c1)= ∅), c1 ∈(c3 /. c2))
  ectocld(hs1, c1, (c3 /. c2), c3, c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), ([hs0]c2 = c1 ∨([hs0]c2 ⋂ c1)= ∅), ([hs0]c2 =[hs1]c2 ∨([hs0]c2 ⋂[hs1]c2)= ∅))
  eqid((c3 /. c2))
  orbi12d([hs1]c2 = c1, [hs0]c2 =[hs1]c2, ([hs0]c2 ⋂[hs1]c2)= ∅, [hs0]c2 = c1, ([hs0]c2 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  eqeq2([hs1]c2, c1, [hs0]c2)
  eqeq1d(([hs0]c2 ⋂[hs1]c2), emptycls, ([hs0]c2 ⋂ c1), [hs1]c2 = c1)
  ineq2([hs1]c2, c1, [hs0]c2)
  syl(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)∧ hs1 ∈ c3), ([hs0]c2 =[hs1]c2 ∨([hs0]c2 ⋂[hs1]c2)= ∅), EqvRel(c2))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c3, EqvRel(c2))
  eqvreldisj(c2, hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 = c1 ∨(c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3))
  diff.hs1.w(([hs0]c2 = c1 ∨([hs0]c2 ⋂ c1)= ∅))
}

blocks.name: eqvrelqsel
blocks.content: If an element of a quotient set contains a given element, it is equal to the equivalence class of the element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 28-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqvrelqsel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(weqvrel(c0), wcel(c1, cqs(c2, c0)), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(c1, cec(c3, c0)))
} = {
  3impia(weqvrel(c0), wcel(c1, cqs(c2, c0)), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(c1, cec(c3, c0)))
  ectocld(hs0, c1, cqs(c2, c0), c2, c0, weqvrel(c0), wi(wcel(c3, c1), wceq(c1, cec(c3, c0))), wi(wcel(c3, cec(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c0), cec(c3, c0))))
  eqid(cqs(c2, c0))
  imbi12d(wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c0), c1), wcel(c3, cec(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c0), cec(c3, c0)), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(c1, cec(c3, c0)))
  eleq2(cec(cv(hs0), c0), c1, c3)
  eqeq1(cec(cv(hs0), c0), c1, cec(c3, c0))
  syl5(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(c3, cec(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c0), cec(c3, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3))
  ibi(wcel(c3, cec(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3))
  el2v1(hs0, wcel(c3, cec(cv(hs0), c0)), wb(wcel(c3, cec(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3)))
  elecALTV(cv(hs0), universe, c3, cec(cv(hs0), c0), c0)
  ex(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c0), cec(c3, c0)))
  eqvrelthi(cv(hs0), c0, c3, wa(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3)))
  simpll(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3))
  simpr(wa(weqvrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(weqvrel(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c3, c1), wceq(c1, cec(c3, c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqvrelqsel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((EqvRel(c0)∧ c1 ∈(c2 /. c0)∧ c3 ∈ c1)→ c1 =[c3]c0)
} = {
  3impia(EqvRel(c0), c1 ∈(c2 /. c0), c3 ∈ c1, c1 =[c3]c0)
  ectocld(hs0, c1, (c2 /. c0), c2, c0, EqvRel(c0), (c3 ∈ c1 → c1 =[c3]c0), (c3 ∈[hs0]c0 →[hs0]c0 =[c3]c0))
  eqid((c2 /. c0))
  imbi12d([hs0]c0 = c1, c3 ∈[hs0]c0, [hs0]c0 =[c3]c0, c3 ∈ c1, c1 =[c3]c0)
  eleq2([hs0]c0, c1, c3)
  eqeq1([hs0]c0, c1, [c3]c0)
  syl5((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), c3 ∈[hs0]c0, [hs0]c0 =[c3]c0, hs0[c0]c3)
  ibi(c3 ∈[hs0]c0, hs0[c0]c3)
  el2v1(hs0, c3 ∈[hs0]c0, (c3 ∈[hs0]c0 ↔ hs0[c0]c3))
  elecALTV(hs0, universe, c3, [hs0]c0, c0)
  ex((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), hs0[c0]c3, [hs0]c0 =[c3]c0)
  eqvrelthi(hs0, c0, c3, ((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c2)∧ hs0[c0]c3))
  simpll(EqvRel(c0), hs0 ∈ c2, hs0[c0]c3)
  simpr((EqvRel(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), hs0[c0]c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(EqvRel(c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c3 ∈ c1 → c1 =[c3]c0))
}

blocks.content: Two ways to express equivalent cosets. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 28-Apr-2019.)

thm eqvrelcoss3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(weqvrel(ccoss(c0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(weqvrel(ccoss(c0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s2)))))), w3a(wral(s0, cdm(ccoss(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s2))))))), wa(w3a(wral(s0, cdm(ccoss(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s2))))))), wrel(ccoss(c0))))
  biantru(w3a(wral(s0, cdm(ccoss(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s2))))))), wrel(ccoss(c0)))
  relcoss(c0)
  triantru3(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s2)))))), wral(s0, cdm(ccoss(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s0))))))
  refrelcosslem(s0, c0)
  simpli(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccoss(c0), cv(s0))))), wrel(ccoss(c0)))
  symrelcoss3(s0, s1, c0)
  dfeqvrel3(s0, s1, s2, ccoss(c0))
  diff.ccoss.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccoss.s(s1, c0)
  diff.ccoss.s(s2, c0)
}

thm eqvrelcoss2(class c0) {

thm eqvrelcoss4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
